channel.title: CVE Feed for Kaspersky -- Kaspersky Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Internet Security, Kaspersky Total Security, Kaspersky Free Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Small Office Security, Kaspersky Security Cloud
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kaspersky -- Kaspersky Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Internet Security, Kaspersky Total Security, Kaspersky Free Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Small Office Security, Kaspersky Security Cloud

item.title: CVE-2019-15685|2024-08-05T00:56:22.456Z -- kaspersky -- kaspersky%20anti-virus%2C%20kaspersky%20internet%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20total%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20free%20anti-virus%2C%20kaspersky%20small%20office%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20security%20cloud
item.description: Kaspersky Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Internet Security, Kaspersky Total Security, Kaspersky Free Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Small Office Security, Kaspersky Security Cloud up to 2020, the web protection component allowed an attacker remotely disable such product's security features as private browsing and anti-banner. Bypass.

item.title: CVE-2019-15688|2024-08-05T00:56:22.438Z -- kaspersky -- kaspersky%20anti-virus%2C%20kaspersky%20internet%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20total%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20free%20anti-virus%2C%20kaspersky%20small%20office%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20security%20cloud
item.description: Kaspersky Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Internet Security, Kaspersky Total Security, Kaspersky Free Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Small Office Security, Kaspersky Security Cloud up to 2020, the web protection component did not adequately inform the user about the threat of redirecting to an untrusted site. Bypass.

item.title: CVE-2019-15686|2024-08-05T00:56:22.047Z -- kaspersky -- kaspersky%20anti-virus%2C%20kaspersky%20internet%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20total%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20free%20anti-virus%2C%20kaspersky%20small%20office%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20security%20cloud
item.description: Kaspersky Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Internet Security, Kaspersky Total Security, Kaspersky Free Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Small Office Security, Kaspersky Security Cloud up to 2020, the web protection component allowed an attacker remotely disable various anti-virus protection features. DoS, Bypass.

item.title: CVE-2019-15687|2024-08-05T00:56:22.458Z -- kaspersky -- kaspersky%20anti-virus%2C%20kaspersky%20internet%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20total%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20free%20anti-virus%2C%20kaspersky%20small%20office%20security%2C%20kaspersky%20security%20cloud
item.description: Kaspersky Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Internet Security, Kaspersky Total Security, Kaspersky Free Anti-Virus, Kaspersky Small Office Security, Kaspersky Security Cloud up to 2020, the web protection component was vulnerable to remote disclosure of various information about the user's system (like Windows version and version of the product, host unique ID). Information Disclosure.
